text: The Bolivian Football Federation (, or FBF) is the governing body of football in Bolivia. It was founded in 1925, making it the eighth oldest South American federation. It affiliated to CONMEBOL and FIFA in 1926 and is in charge of Bolivia national football team. ==References== Category:1920s establishments in South America Category:1925 establishments Category:Football governing bodies in South America Category:Football in Bolivia Category:Organizations based in Bolivia
title: Bolivian Football Federation
